title: Chat Room
brief: Synchronous chat server that allows users to communicate via direct message, group chat and broadcast.

title: VR Robotic Car
brief: A teleop robotic car with camera onboard. Uses OpenCV to create VR stream of the front view for the user.

title: Smartendance
brief: Cloud based attendance tracking tool that uses face recognition to automate the process.

title: SimuStocks
brief: A real time stock market simulator that allows users to practise trading with virtual balance.

title: Teleop Maze
brief: A maze that is remotely controlled by the positioning of user's mobile device.

title: Minesweeper
brief: Minesweeper GUI application with multiple difficulty levels developed using Java Swing.
